DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare effect addition combination Atorvastatin/CoenzymeQ10 standard congestive heart failure ( CHF ) treatment versus addition Atorvastatin alone CHF outcome .
DOC.criteria: Documented Congestive hear failure Ejection Fraction less 40 percent Compensated heart failure without hospital admission previous three month No change type dose medication last month New York Heart Association Function Class 2 4 Acute coronary syndrome develop last month Active myocarditis Active pericarditis Uncontrolled hypertension Hepatic failure ( Child B , C ) Pulmonary failure Renal failure Heart failure KILLIP classification 3 4
